Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Update comment text for FileFormatVersions.cs" (#908) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: Represents Microsoft Office 2019 comment for Office2019

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "SaveAs WordprocessingDocumentType.Template loses image references" (#836) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Closed issue "OpenXmlValidator not validating boolean values" (#887) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened issue "New NuGet prerelease 2.13.0-beta0001 with Office 2019 support" (#907) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
This is a note that we just released Beta version of SDK with support for Office 2019: namespaces and generated classes. Please give it a try and report issues, specifying NuGet package version number.

You need to check “Include prerelease” in VS NuGet Package Manager to see **2.13.0-beta0001** version.
